#summary How to move a term to another dictionary?.
#labels FAQ,Phase-Usage,eng

=== How to move a term to another dictionary? === 

 # In admin area, search for a term you'd like to move. 
   http://glossword.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/how-term-move-01.png
 # Use checkbox to select one or several terms. 
   http://glossword.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/how-term-move-02.png
 # See the bottom of page "With selected". Click on "Move to". 
   http://glossword.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/how-term-move-03.png

The ability to move terms cross dictionaries is available since version 1.7.0 (9 July, 2005).
